page.title: Losing Our Religion: The Liberal Media's Attack on Christianity

*Reviews of the Christian story "[[The Chronicles of Narnia (film series)|Narnia]]" were lukewarm despite its being a box office hit. Reviews for [[The Golden Compass (film)|The Golden Compass]], which attacks Christianity, were positive although the movie did not do well at the tills.<ref name="Losing Our Religion:The Liberal Mediaâs Attack on Christianity polarizes conservatives, liberals, raises claims of irony"/>
*Cupp also noted that the liberal press downplays Obamaâs discomfort with religious America and barely wrote about his covering up of religious imagery in the backdrop when he gave a speech at [[Georgetown University]].<ref name="Losing Our Religion:The Liberal Mediaâs Attack on Christianity polarizes conservatives, liberals, raises claims of irony"/>
